summary: Deep analysis confirms Box semantics limitation is fundamental and insurmountable. MCS-Restricted Truth Lemma cannot provide alternative to semantic_weak_completeness. The key insight is that semantic_weak_completeness IS the correct completeness theorem via contrapositive - attempting to avoid it is misguided.

artifacts.summary: Analysis of Box semantics limitation - confirms gap is fundamental, recommends accepting semantic_weak_completeness as canonical completeness theorem
